xdi2.transport.impl.http.interceptor.impl

Class RedirectHttpTransportInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.messaging.container.impl.AbstractExtension<CONTAINER>
      • xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.AbstractInterceptor<Transport<?,?>>
        • xdi2.transport.impl.http.interceptor.impl.AbstractHttpTransportInterceptor
          • xdi2.transport.impl.http.interceptor.impl.RedirectHttpTransportInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extension<Transport<?,?>>, Interceptor<Transport<?,?>>, HttpTransportInterceptor

    public class RedirectHttpTransportInterceptor
extends AbstractHttpTransportInterceptor
    This interceptor redirects to a specified URL in case of a GET request without path.
    Author:
    markus
